title: Et cetera. Episode 6 [Joe Felber Multimedia Installation]
creator_credit: Michael Costello, David McLauchlan and Northern Access TV
brief_description: Presented by David McLauchlan outside the Australian Centre for Contemporary Art, Melbourne. David interviews multimedia artist Joe Felber and dancer/choreographer Lucy Guerin about their collaborative installation with composer Elliott Gyger entitled “25 songs on 25 lines of 25 words on Art Statement for seven voices and dance” based on Ad Reinhardt’s Black Painting and Art Statement. Following the interviews, there is a presentation of Joe Felber’s 7 minute video on the multimedia performance “25 songs on 25 lines…and dance”.
